history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Benton
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to benton avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, leaving from the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER 8 A.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 08:00 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 18 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 8 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 8th avenue at Amity St. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER repeat

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 52L <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Blvd of Allies at Market St.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 8:17am. </prosody> </speak>

USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 6 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Liberty avenue at 6th St. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 16 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Brighton Rd at Benton avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 8:56am. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 12 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Benton avenue, Pittsburgh, PA, USA. </prosody> </speak>

TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER restart
